title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard to create a nested class, the context is not correctly set.
EB: The new class wizard should correctly set the context for nested classes.
SR:
1. Open the new class wizard.
2. Select the option to create a nested class.
3. Follow the wizard steps to create the nested class.
4. Verify that the context is correctly set for the nested class.
